column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=The other day , I had to catch a train from Los Angles to New York at the last minute .
#text=My boss wanted me to meet some foreign client in a brand new art gallery they recently bought in Manhattan .

#text=The boss called me at about 5:30 in the morning and told me that he already bought tickets to get from here to New York , but explained to me that he could n't make it as he had another meeting to that same morning .

#text=The tickets were for a train that departed at 7:15 am , so like a good worker bee , I got up , skipped showering , got dressed , and ran out the door with a dirty wrinkled suit I had n't had time to wash .
#text=The airport was 40 minutes away so I had very little time to spare .
#text=I managed to store my car and walk into the train station half asleep right at 7:10 am when I overheard my train was delayed over the intercom .
#text=When my train was called an hour later , I drowsily made my way on board where I got a window seat next to a larger fellow .
#text=I remember I was half asleep when I mumbled a hello to him .
#text=He happily greeted me back as I sat down .
#text=Right before the train took off and the trains stewardesses were telling us how to use our seat belts , I barely remember ending up falling asleep on the large man next to me .
#text=Four hours later , I got a nudge from the large man next to me telling me kindly to wake up and that our ride was over .
#text=I distinctly remember waking up with a mouthful of drool soaked on the large man ' s arm I feel asleep on and instantly apologized .
#text=He laughed and said to me Don ' t worry about it !
#text=Would you believe this is n't the first time this has happened to me ?
#text=We both kind of laughed and went on our ways .
#text=It ended up being a great ride and sleep , overall .
